titleStmt.title: Mel heliconium, or, Poeticall honey gathered out of the weeds of Parnassus divided into VII chapters according to the first VII letters of the alphabet : containing XLVIII fictions, out of which are extracted many historicall, naturall, morall, politicall and by Alexander Rosse ...
titleStmt.author: Ross, Alexander, 1591-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by L.N. and J.F. for William Leak ...,
